context.p: The following steps describe the upgrading procedure of , valid for Windows:

step.cmd: In case you added files, or modified files from the installation folder of , save a copy of them. These files are overwritten during the upgrade.

stepsection.note: Custom frameworks are preserved, but we recommend you to back them up as well.

step.cmd: Run the new installation kit and install the new version in the folder where the old version was installed.
When you are promoted to choose whether you want to upgrade the existed installation, select Proceed.
step.stepresult: The old version is uninstalled automatically and the new one takes its place.

step.cmd: Copy the files you previously backed up in the installation folder.
